english.segment1: My back hits the concrete. Cold to the nerves. The clouds stretch black and white. Photographs onto the blanket. Of gray that rests above me. Content lying here, I feel so small
english.segment2: One moment, silence fills the air. One moment, I can feel you there. Your fingerprints are everywhere. With life on mute, time passes so fast
english.segment3: Back to reason. Yet unable to compute the equation. A silhouette of what came before lies beside me
english.segment4: One moment, silence fills the air. One moment, I can feel you there. Your fingerprints are everywhere. With life on mute, time passes so fast
english.segment5: Whispering crows into the night. Disrupting the cumulus at work
english.segment6: One moment, silence fills the air. One moment, I can feel you there. Your fingerprints are everywhere. With life on mute, time passes so fast
